means: 想像力( fancy的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: If she ever fancies a job swap, I could be interested.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果她想和别人互换工作，我会很感兴趣的。
她自以为是放荡不羁的艺术家。

sentence.Network_en: He fancies himself, hoping to get that job.
sentence.Network_cn: 他自视甚高,竟想得到那份工作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 翻译词典... ... fancies 花式织物, 花色货品 fancies n.花式织物,花色货器.
He , versed in fancying , fancies the infinite ., 他善于遐想 , 遐想无限;
he was a man of exuberant fancy , and , withal , an authority so irresistible that , at his will , he turned his varied fancies into facts .他是茂盛的花梢的一个人，并且，然而很不可抗拒的当局，在他的将，他把他各种各样的花梢变成事实。
others may have undergone , or may still undergo them -- we a charmed life , which laughs to scorn all such idle fancies .这些事，别人也许经历过，或者可能要承受——但我们自己“冥冥中有神保佑”，对于诸如此类脆弱的念头，统统付之轻蔑的一笑。
